products.name: Chocolate Cooling Tunnel
products.design: Air or water cooled tunnel with modular design
products.applications: Chocolate enrobing lines, molded chocolates, chocolate drops, and bakery products.
products.features: Modular design, adjustable belt speed, CPU-controlled climate system, energy-saving CFC-free insulation. Length and temperature built to product specifications.
products.differentiator: Precisely controls temperature (typically 5-10°C, some down to 0°C) for optimal chocolate crystallization and texture. Modular construction allows custom configurations.

specifications.cooling_method: Controlled air circulation, sometimes with cold slab cooling

products.name: Gel Cooling Tunnel
products.design: ISO-certified automatic cooling tunnel with PLC control
products.applications: Gels/OTC tubes, confectionery, bakery, and pharmaceutical products.
products.features: ISO-certified build with 1-year warranty. Automatic operation, temperature sensors, PLC control with HMI touch screen panels, and adjustable cooling zones.
products.differentiator: Maintains precise temperature control (0-5°C, some systems down to 0.1°C) with automatic operation for pharmaceutical-grade cooling requirements.

specifications.cooling_method: Forced air ventilation, water spraying, or glycol-cooled heat exchangers with fans
specifications.insulation: Thick insulation (polystyrene, polyurethane, or foamed PVC)

products.name: Jam Cooling Tunnel
products.design: Water spray cooling tunnel with PLC control
products.applications: Hot-filled jam jars, bottles, or pouches to preserve product quality and extend shelf life.
products.features: Continuous cooling for texture and shelf life preservation. Water spray nozzles for cooling, automatic temperature control, PLC touch screen interfaces.
products.differentiator: Gentle cooling prevents thermal shock to glass containers while ensuring food safety. Typically cools products to around 20°C (customizable).

specifications.cooling_method: Water spray nozzles (sometimes with chilled air or refrigeration)

products.name: Bakery/Peanut-Butter Cooling Tunnel
products.design: High-throughput automatic cooling tunnel with multi-zone temperature control
products.applications: Bakery products (cookies, biscuits, cakes, bread) and peanut butter production.
products.features: High throughput (>400 kg/h) with 10-30 min holding time. Multiple temperature control zones, adjustable conveyor speed, uniform airflow distribution, modular design. CE/ISO/UL certification options.
products.differentiator: Capable of handling high production volumes with consistent cooling across multiple product types. Stainless steel construction ensures food safety compliance.

specifications.cooling_method: Convection cooling from top, water-cooled bottom plates
specifications.conveyor_build: Automatic operation, CE/ISO/UL options. Stainless steel construction
